name: The Consumist Journey
description:
The Consumist Journey is a surreal exploration game where you play as a torso-headed character on a quest to explore the capitalist and consumerist paradigms of modern society.

Navigate through bizarre and nonsensical environments, solve puzzles, and interact with eccentric characters to learn more about the world and your place in it.

Along the way, you'll confront challenging questions about the nature of consumerism, capitalism, and the human condition.
Key Features:
Explore a surreal and nonsensical world: The Consumist Journey features a unique and imaginative art style that creates a surreal and thought-provoking world to explore.
Play as a torso-headed character: Your character is a torso with a head, but don't let that stop you from exploring and solving puzzles.
Unravel the mysteries of capitalism and consumerism: Through your interactions with the world and its inhabitants, you'll learn more about the capitalist and consumerist paradigms of modern society.
Confront challenging questions: The Consumist Journey is a game that asks difficult questions about the nature of our world. What is the true cost of our consumerism? What is our place in a capitalist society?
If you're a fan of surreal exploration games, thought-provoking narratives, and challenging questions, then this is the game for you.
